author: louistsai0402
content:
EELS Benchmark Test Release v0.0.7

Link: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/releases/tag/benchmark%40v0.0.7
### Major Changes
- All benchmarks are now Osaka-compatible
- Added support for fixed-opcode-count benchmarks for repricing analysis
- Published up-to-date benchmark documentation ([link](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/blob/forks/amsterdam/docs/writing_tests/benchmarks.md))
### Notes
- `test_blockhash` is excluded from this release due to excessive execution time and resource usage
